name: Pinball Arcade: Terminator 2 Judgment Day
blurb: Help us bring the Terminator 2: Judgment Day pinball table to game consoles and mobile devices for a whole new generation to enjoy!

rewards.reward: Don't have much to spend but still want to help the cause?  For $1 you'll have our gratitude, plus the satisfaction of knowing you helped make the preservation of this table possible!
Get the Terminator 2: Judgment Day pinball table on a single platform of your choice, PLUS your name listed as a backer in the game credits! How cool is that?!?

Get the Pro version of the Terminator 2: Judgment Day pinball table including access to the table operator\u2019s menu on a single platform of your choice, PLUS your name listed as a BRONZE backer in the game credits!

Get the Terminator 2: Judgment Day pinball table on any two platforms of your choice, PLUS your name listed as a backer in the game credits, AND an exclusive Terminator 2: Judgment Day Pinball wallpaper for the device of your choice.

Everything above PLUS an additional copy of the table for the platform of your choice (for a total of three) AND an exclusive Terminator 2: Judgment Day edition virtual pinball (which can be used on any of the tables in the Pinball Arcade!)

Everything above PLUS an additional copy of the table for the platform of your choice (for a total of four) AND a special Pro version of the Terminator 2: Judgment Day pinball table including access to the table operator\u2019s menu on a single platform of your choice.
Everything above PLUS your name listed as a SILVER backer in the game credits!
Everything above PLUS an entry into the exclusive Pinball Arcade Supporters Tournament!

Everything above PLUS the special Pro version of the Terminator 2: Judgment Day pinball table including access to the table operator\u2019s menu on every platform we support, AND your name listed as a GOLD backer in the game credits!
Everything above PLUS a cool Pinball Arcade Development Team shirt. It's the latest in pinball fashion statements- be the envy of all your friends!
Everything above PLUS be a Beta Tester with early access to the table AND see your name listed as a Beta Tester in the Development Team portion of the game credits!

Everything above PLUS you'll become an official Pinball Arcade Beta Tester with early access to ALL future table packs (not just Terminator 2!)  You can help us make these tables better by reporting bugs and suggesting tuning improvements, and you will credited as a Beta Tester in all future table credits!
Everything above PLUS a copy of Pinball Hall of Fame: The Williams Collection signed by the FarSight development team. We only have a few of these left, and when they're gone they're gone...

Everything above PLUS a conference call with the Pinball Arcade design team during the Terminator 2: Judgment Day Beta. Tell us how the table plays, what needs to be improved, and suggest which tables we should do next. Your input can have a real impact!  You'll also have your name listed as a PLATINUM backer in the game credits.

Everything above PLUS lunch and one-on-one with the FarSight design team! We\u2019ll give you a tour of our studio in Big Bear Lake, California and you'll get an inside look at how we digitize pinball tables. We\u2019ll show you what we\u2019re currently working on (and you\u2019ll be among the first outside the studio to play it!) You are responsible for your travel (but lunch is on us!)

The FarSight team will travel to a location of your choosing (within the continental US please, unless you live someplace really cool). We\u2019ll set up and host a virtual pinball tournament for you and your friends complete with prizes and goodies. We\u2019ll bring along the latest new tables and you\u2019ll be among the first outside the studio to play them! Your name will also be highlighted with a Special Thanks in the credits as someone who really made a difference.
